titleStmt.title: A theological epitome or Divine compend apparently manifesting Gods great love and mercie towards man: notwithstanding of mans perverse disposition, and continuall vnthankefulnesse towards his God. By Iohn Kennedie.
Theological epitome.
titleStmt.author: Kennedy, John, fl. 1626.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; trimmed at top affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
